summary: This is an email chain from April 2019 regarding the handling of a significant document production in the Epstein case. An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests technical assistance to unzip and organize 16 zip files containing case materials, emphasizing the importance of careful handling.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the initial email requesting assistance with unzipping and organizing a significant document production in the Epstein case. They apologize for the painstaking task but stress its importance.

events.title: Request to Process Epstein Case Production
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney requests technical assistance to unzip and organize 16 zip files containing a significant document production in the Epstein case, stressing the importance of correct handling.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

events.title: Completion of File Unzipping
events.description: The technical task of unzipping the Epstein case production files is reported as completed, with an offer to make changes if needed.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

events.title: Additional Small Production Received
events.description: A follow-up email indicates an additional small production of files was received, requesting the same unzipping and organization process.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: A significant document production in the Epstein case was received, consisting mostly of 16 zip files.
An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York requested careful technical assistance to unzip and organize these files, bypassing IT or interns to ensure nothing was lost.
The email chain shows the task was initiated around April 20, 2019, and was completed by April 22, 2019.
An additional small production was received on April 23, 2019, requiring the same processing.
The correspondence highlights the procedural handling of evidence in the federal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.
